description:
In order to help Jose and Claudia with their wish, Midge and the others come up with a plan to get through the tight security of the seed storehouse on Planet Yellow. Along the way the bugs end up trapped and it`s up to Jose and Claudia to rescue them. Once finally inside the storehouse, the others are surprised to encounter a robot who introduces itself as Dr. Seed. With the help of Dr. Seed Midge and the others are able to get the seeds they came for, but as they get ready to leave they are confronted by bug busters. Now the race is on for Midge and the others to make it out of the seed storehouse safely with their hard-won seeds.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Plan to Infiltrate the Seed Storehouse / Distant Exit
Shushi Chozouko Sennyuu Sakusen / Toosugiru Deguchi
種子貯蔵庫潜入作戦 / 遠すぎる出口
